thread.title: JA

author: JA
title: JA
text: I had reservations buying a dress on line for my daughter. I tried all the department stores and no such luck finding the right dress that would fit my 5'7" 13 year old . I used the prom girl measurement tool and It saved me ! The measurements were spot on (it told me to go up in dress size, and again I had reservations, but I did it. The prom Girl measurement tool was spot on! The dress is absolutely gorgeous and true to color and FITS PERFECT!!! I'm extremely picky and I grew up with a mother that sewed . So, I know good design quality when I see it , and it was absolutely perfect!!!
